Hero.text_main: Ivan Malakhovskyi Enthusiastic Full Stack Developer from Ukraine, Vinnytsia
Hero.summary: I am a Full Stack Developer. Recently I am a successfully completed commercial project
Hero.summary_add: at company Team Challenge. I am currently working as a frontend developer at Talent Bay and am ready for new opportunities.

About.title: About me
About.text: Full Stack Developer with a background in Biology and strong analytical skills. Currently building user-centric startup project at Talent Bay using Next.js, TS, Zustand, Antd. Previously developed a custom CMS from scratch and key product card features in a commercial marketplace project. Passionate about clean code, performance, and continuous learning.
